description: Detects potential RDP connection via Mstsc using a local ".rdp" file
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Christopher Peacock @securepeacock
false_positives: Likely with legitimate usage of ".rdp" files
name: Mstsc.EXE Execution With Local RDP File
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\mstsc.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"mstsc.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*.rdp" OR "*.rdp\"")) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\lxss\wslhost.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\WSL\\wslg.rdp*")))
